introduction_content: Welcome to EventEase (hereinafter 'the Application'). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you use the Application. By using EventEase, you agree to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.

subdata_content: Messages sent via our customer support
Browsing and usage data (pages visited, actions taken)

data_usage_content: Manage your user account and subscriptions
Respond to your requests through our customer support

data_sharing_content.subsharing_content: We use Stripe for payment management and other technical partners necessary for the proper functioning of the Application.
If legally required, we may share certain information with the competent authorities.

data_retention_content: Account data: retained until the account is deleted or after a prolonged period of inactivity.
Payment data: retained in accordance with legal obligations.
Browsing data: retained for up to 12 months.

user_rights_content.subright_content: You may request a copy of the data we hold about you.
You may request the correction of inaccurate information.
You may request the deletion of your data under certain conditions.

user_rights_content.subright_title: 6.4 Right to object and restrict processing
user_rights_content.subright_content: You may limit or refuse certain data processing activities.
You may retrieve your data in a structured format.

data_security_content: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, loss, or disclosure.
cookies_management_content: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
policy_modifications_content: We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be communicated through the Application.
contact_content: For any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, you can contact us at contact@easeevent.be.
